titleStmt.title: Theologo-Historicus, or, The true life of the most reverend divine, and excellent historian, Peter Heylyn ... written by his son in law, John Barnard ... to correct the errors, supply the defects, and confute the calumnies of a late writer ; also an answer to Mr. Baxters false accusations of Dr. Heylyn.
titleStmt.author: Barnard, John, d. 1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.S. and are to be sold by Ed. Eckelston ...,

notesStmt.note: "A catalogue of such books as were written by the learned doctor": p. 297-301.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
